snippet: Passengers on the flight from New York to Las Vegas were essential in safely defusing the situation involving an out-of-control pilot.
abstract: Joe Sharkey On the Road column asserts passengers on the March 27 JetBlue flight were essential in safely defusing the situation involving an out-of-control pilot.
lead_paragraph: Passengers on the flight from New York to Las Vegas were essential in safely defusing the situation involving an out-of-control pilot.
